snippet: The Senate voted to confirm Julián Castro as secretary of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, catapulting the young mayor of San Antonio to the national stage.
abstract: Senate votes 71-26 to confirm Julian Castro as secretary of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, catapulting the young mayor of San Antonio to the national stage.
lead_paragraph: The Senate voted to confirm Julián Castro as secretary of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, catapulting the young mayor of San Antonio to the national stage.

headline.seo: Castro Is Approved to Lead Housing Department
headline.main: Senate Confirms Obama's Pick for Housing Secretary
headline.print_headline: San Antonio Mayor Confirmed as Housing Secretary
